userrelationship-desc: 允许发送朋友和仇敌请求
ur-error-title: Whoops, you took a wrong turn!
ur-error-message-no-user: 我们不能完成您的请求，因为没有叫这个名字的用户
ur-add-no-user:
No user selected.
Please request friends/foes through the correct link.
ur-remove-relationship-title-foe: Do you want to remove $1 as your foe?
ur-remove-relationship-title-confirm-foe: You have removed $1 as your foe
ur-remove-relationship-title-friend: Do you want to remove $1 as your friend?
ur-remove-relationship-title-confirm-fri: You have removed $1 as your friend
ur-remove-relationship-message-foe: You have requested to remove $1 as your foe, press "$2" to confirm.
ur-remove-relationship-message-confirm-f: You have successfully removed $1 as your foe.
ur-remove-relationship-message-friend: You have requested to remove $1 as your friend, press "$2" to confirm.
ur-remove-relationship-message-confirm-f: You have successfully removed $1 as your friend.
ur-remove-error-message-no-relationship: You do not have a relationship with $1.
ur-remove-error-message-pending-foe-requ: You have a pending foe request with $1.
ur-remove-error-message-pending-friend-r: You have a pending friend request with $1.
ur-remove-error-not-loggedin-foe: You have to be logged in to remove a foe.
ur-remove-error-not-loggedin-friend: You have to be logged in to remove a friend.
ur-add-title-foe: 您是否想要将 $1 添加为仇敌?
ur-add-title-friend: 您是否想要将 $1 添加为朋友?
ur-add-message-foe:
您将要将 $1 添加为仇敌
我们会告诉 $1 您的不满
ur-add-message-friend:
您将要将 $1 添加为朋友
我们会提醒 $1 同意您的朋友请求
ur-add-sent-title-foe: 我们已经向 $1 发送了您的仇敌请求!
ur-add-sent-title-friend: 我们已经向 $1 发送了您的朋友请求!
ur-add-sent-message-foe:
您的仇敌请求已经发送至 $1 以确认
如果 $1 回答了您的请求，您会收到一个结果提醒
ur-add-sent-message-friend:
您的朋友请求已经发送至 $1 以确认
如果 $1 回答了您的请求，您会收到一个结果提醒
ur-add-error-message-no-user: 您请求添加的用户不存在
ur-add-error-message-blocked: 您已经被屏蔽，因此不能添加朋友或仇敌
ur-add-error-message-yourself: 您不能添加自己为朋友或仇敌
ur-add-error-message-existing-relationsh: 您已经是 $1 的仇敌了
您已经是 $1 的朋友了
ur-add-error-message-pending-friend-requ:
您已经向 $1 发送了朋友请求
当 $1 回答时我们会向您发送提醒
ur-add-error-message-pending-foe-request:
您已经向 $1 发送了仇敌请求
当 $1 回答时我们会向您发送提醒
ur-add-error-message-not-loggedin-foe: 您必须登录之后才能添加仇敌
ur-add-error-message-not-loggedin-friend: 您必须登录之后才能添加朋友
ur-no-requests-message: 您没有任何朋友或仇敌请求
ur-requests-added-message-foe: 您已将 $1 添加为您的仇敌
ur-requests-added-message-friend: 您已将 $1 添加为您的朋友
ur-requests-reject-message-friend: 您已经拒绝了 $1 的朋友请求
ur-requests-reject-message-foe: 您已经拒绝了 $1 的仇敌请求
friend_request_subject: $1 已经在 {{SITENAME}} 上添加您为朋友!
friend_request_body_html:
Hi $1.

$2 has added you as a friend on {{SITENAME}}. We want to make sure that you two are actually friends.

Please click this link to confirm your friendship:
[[Special:ViewRelationshipRequests]]

Thanks,


The {{SITENAME}} team

---

Hey, want to stop getting emails from us?

Click [[Special:UpdateProfile]]
and change your settings to disable email notifications.
friend_request_body:
Hi $1.

$2 has added you as a friend on {{SITENAME}}. We want to make sure that you two are actually friends.

Please click this link to confirm your friendship:
$3

Thanks,


The {{SITENAME}} team

---

Hey, want to stop getting emails from us?

Click $4
and change your settings to disable email notifications.
foe_request_subject: It's war! $1 has added you to as a foe on {{SITENAME}}!
foe_request_body_html:
Hi $1.

$2 just listed you as a foe on {{SITENAME}}. We want to make sure that you two are actually mortal enemies or at least having an argument.

Please click this link to confirm the grudge match.

[[Special:ViewRelationshipRequests]]

Thanks,


The {{SITENAME}} team

---

Hey, want to stop getting emails from us?

Click [[Special:UpdateProfile]]
and change your settings to disable email notifications.
foe_request_body:
Hi $1.

Thanks,


The {{SITENAME}} team

Hey, want to stop getting emails from us?

Click $4
and change your settings to disable email notifications.

echo-pref-tooltip-social-rel: Notify me when someone sends me a user relationship request (friend or foe request).
apihelp-socialprofile-request-response-p: Response to the relationship request; 1 to accept, -1 to reject.
Unique identifier of the relationship request
